Crafted with rich, expressive oil colors, this painting transports viewers to the idyllic landscapes of Scotland.

description: Introducing our Eye Mosaic- an intriguing and expressive piece of art that captures the depth and emotion found within the human eye.The intricate arrangement of tiles allows for the portrayal of subtle nuances in shading, reflections, and highlights, resulting in a mesmerizing and lifelike gaze.
